name: Wooden Coconut Spoon
description:
Stylish, sustainable, and easy to clean, our spoons are perfect for scooping up whatever nourishing meal you have in your Coconut Bowl!

A wonderful eco-friendly replacement for plastic cutlery

Handmade

Perfect for digging into your bowls, these beautiful coconut spoons are handcrafted by artisans.

Perfect for everything

Perfect for eating ice cream, desserts, or any other food that requires a spoon.

Durable

100% brand new and high quality，made of high quality wooden material, non-toxic, tasteless and durable

Features and cleaning instructions:

  1. Hand wash your cutlery and do not soak for long periods of time.
  2. Do not expose your cutlery to extreme heat.
  3. Use for warm, room temperature and cold foods.
  4. Do not place your cutlery in the refrigerator, microwave, oven or dishwasher.
  5. Lightweight and durable.

      Specification:

      • Anti-bacterial.
      • Material:Coconut shell
      • Color:As Shown in picture.
      • Dimension: 6.88inchx1.18inch (17.5*3cm)
